response.overview: Mina lost her parents from a fire when she was a child, and has been rescued and adopted by Hoon Sik and was raised like her own daughter. She follows her father who she likes, and thinks of as a man. Mina's friend Soo Jin has been in and out of Mina's house since they were kids. She also see Hoon Sik as her ideal type. And then another friend, Min Cheol... though a return student, he thinks of Mina and Soo Jin as friends and they rely on each other.
response.title: Father, Daughter and Her Friends
